## BlockSvg.render() method

Lays out and reflows a block based on its contents and settings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
render(opt_bubble?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_bubble | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> If false, just render this block. If true, also render block's parent, grandparent, etc. Defaults to true. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
